bugs.summary: Fix `resource-selection-currentSrc.html`'s usage of Blob ctor
Mixed content download protection creates but doesn't clean up second file
Fix comment in RenderCompositorOGLSWGL
Fix cancelPromise in ReadableStreamTee being resolved twice (again)
Make check for redundant property changes more precise
Make <textarea> inline-block by default
scroll-padding not respected when scrolling an input into view in response to typing.
Paint auto style outline with WebRender if possible
Correct corner radii of progress bar, range and meter in non-native theme
Clean up lookandfeel caching / pref values a bit.
Change public LookAndFeel color APIs to take a color scheme.
Plumb ColorScheme through nsXPLookAndFeel.
[Wayland] Don't call nsWaylandDisplay::WaitForSyncEnd() from Compositor/Render thread
Undefined symbol: (anonymous namespace)::NowIncludingSuspendMs() ../../mozglue/misc/Uptime.o
Screenshot filename uses wrong day number (day# + 1 instead of day#)
Searches such as Einstein@Home resolve to URL instead of Search
Can't open multiple bookmarks at once from the bookmarks sidebar using the context menu
“Send Link to Device” context menu option is placed in its own section
FxA submenu header is not updated accordingly when the submenu is opened for the first time
Implement multistage proton welcome and import screen as per proton design
Update pdf.js to version 2.8.320
Ensure browser/extensions/screenshots/selector/util.js passes eslint check
Ensure browser/extensions/screenshots/selector/ui.js passes eslint check
Ensure browser/extensions/screenshots/sitehelper.js passes eslint check
Ensure browser/extensions/screenshots/background/analytics.js passes eslint check
Ensure browser/extensions/screenshots/test/browser/browser_screenshots_injection.js passes eslint check
Port relevant page actions tests
